headline: Fortinet (NasdaqGS:FTNT) Enhances Email Security With New AI-Powered Protection Features
summary: Fortinet (NasdaqGS:FTNT) recently announced significant enhancements to its security portfolio, including the launch of the FortiMail Workspace Security suite, expanding its capabilities in email and collaboration tool security with AI-powered protection. Over the past week, the company's stock price moved slightly down by 1.78%. This minor decline coincides with a flat market trajectory. Although Fortinet's comprehensive security solutions may bolster its long-term prospects, the stock's...
